allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Simplify GitHub Actions workflow and fix build issues

- Remove path filtering to trigger builds on all pushes
- Simplify build process using npm script instead of cargo
- Add authors field to Cargo.toml for better package metadata
- Remove unnecessary Tauri prerequisites installation
- Build should work with standard GitHub Actions environment
")

Bash(git commit -m "Simplify GitHub Actions workflow to debug build

- Remove code signing requirements
- Use debug build for faster compilation
- Split build into frontend and backend steps
- Install cargo-tauri directly with specific version
- Focus on generating executable rather than full installer bundle
")

Bash(git commit -m "Add troubleshooting workflow and fix configuration issues

- Create test-build.yml to isolate build step failures
- Update author email to actual GitHub account
- Remove bundle targets to avoid complex installer generation
- Simplify app title to remove MVP suffix
")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix AnalysisResultsPage compilation error

- Remove duplicate startProgressUpdate function definition
- Keep enhanced version with logging functionality
- Fix Vue compiler error about redeclared identifiers
")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Rust compilation errors

- Fix atomic import path in state.rs (use std::sync::atomic)  
- Add missing Ordering import in feed.rs
- Fix type mismatch in main.rs match expression
- Remove unused imports in operations.rs
- Clean up duplicate RSSArticle import
")
